item.name: Hente gyldig accesstoken med riktig scopen

exec: pm.test("find element id for client_id ", function () {

body.raw: {"value":["   idporten:authorizations.revoke idporten:user.log.read krr:user.log.all.read idporten:dcr.read idporten:dcr.write idporten:dcr.modify idporten:scopes.write idporten:scopes.read"]}

{
    "client_name": "knut-oidc-test",
    "description": "Knut sin testklient oidc",
    "authorization_lifetime": 3600,
    "access_token_lifetime": 3600,
    "refresh_token_lifetime": 3600,
    "client_type": "PUBLIC",
    "token_reference": "OPAQUE",
    "refresh_token_usage": "ONETIME",
    "frontchannel_logout_session_required": false,
    "force_pkce": false,
    "client_id": "123456789",
    "client_orgno": null,
    "client_uri": "https://wwww.knut.no",
    "supplier_orgno": null,
    "active": false,
    "default_scopes": [],
    "logo_uri": "bilde.gif",
    "grant_types": ["urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"],
    "last_updated": "2019-03-21T17:03:59.583+01:00",
    "created": "2019-03-08T15:50:40.540+01:00"
}

{
	
    "name": "tullenamn:eldar",
    "active": true,
    "prefix": "eldar",
    "subscope": "nyttscope1{{ran}}",
    "description": "Dette er Knut sitt interne scope",
    "visibility": "PUBLIC",
    "last_updated": "2019-02-08T09:09:12.057+01:00",

   "token_type": "SELF_CONTAINED"

}

item.name: scope styring med forskjeling scope parameter

exec: var txt="Token contains scopes not available to the client: "+pm.globals.get("new_scope1")+","+pm.globals.get("new_scope2");

body.raw:
{
    "name": "{{new_scope1}}",
    "active": true,
    "prefix": "lra",
    "subscope": "nyttscope11324",
